about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of DarkLight: Platformer, where adventure and fun await you at every step. This exciting 2D platformer promises you an unforgettable journey through 150 unique levels and five diverse biomes.

Game Features:

  • Collectibles: Feel like a true collector as you gather 200 unique items scattered throughout the levels. Each item has its own story.
  • Character Variety: Choose from one of 54 unique characters, each with their own traits, strengths, and weaknesses. Collect them all and unlock their potential.
  • Progression and Equipment: Improve your character's attributes and equipment from over 120 different options that will aid you in battles against enemies.
  • Magic and Spells: Immerse yourself in a magical world with 12 powerful spells that will help you solve puzzles and battle bosses.

DarkLight: Platformer is not just an exciting game, but also an immersion into a world of magic and adventure. Dive into this unique world and embark on the adventure of your dreams!

name: DarkLight: Platformer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to the world of DarkLight: Platformer, where adventure and fun await you at every step. This exciting 2D platformer promises you an unforgettable journey through 150 unique levels and five diverse biomes.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Hebrew, Simplified Chinese
